steps: Open the Microsoft Word document called Document11.docx.
Click on the 'Review' tab in the ribbon.
In the 'Tracking' group, click on 'Compare' and then select 'Compare' from the dropdown menu.
In the 'Compare Documents' dialog box, click on the 'More' button.
Select 'Choose another document' and browse to the location of the document you want to compare with.
Select the document you want to compare with and click on the 'Open' button.
In the 'Compare Documents' dialog box, click on the 'OK' button.
Review the changes highlighted in the compared document.
Save and close the compared document.
Close the Microsoft Word document called Document11.docx.
